Head.name: _No Head
Head.desc: No Head

Head.name: Adventurer Goggles
Head.desc: Treasure Hunter Increases chance to get loot from destroying breakables. 10%/20%/35%

Chest.name: Adventurer Tunic
Chest.desc: Treasure Hunter Increases chance to get loot from destroying breakables. 10%/20%/35%

Legs.name: Adventurer Leggings
Legs.desc: Treasure Hunter Increases chance to get loot from destroying breakables. 10%/20%/35%

Head.name: Akari Mask
Head.desc: Opportunist Perfect dodging enemy attacks increases Melee Attack Speed and grants 100% Melee Critical Chance for 5 seconds. 5%/10%/20% Melee Attack Speed

Chest.name: Akari Garb
Chest.desc: Opportunist Perfect dodging enemy attacks increases Melee Attack Speed and grants 100% Melee Critical Chance for 5 seconds. 5%/10%/20% Melee Attack Speed

Legs.name: Akari Leggings
Legs.desc: Opportunist Perfect dodging enemy attacks increases Melee Attack Speed and grants 100% Melee Critical Chance for 5 seconds. 5%/10%/20% Melee Attack Speed

Head.name: Bandit's Mask
Head.desc: Freeloader Chance to replace spent bullet on hit. 10%/20%/35% Chance

Chest.name: Bandit Jacket
Chest.desc: Freeloader Chance to replace spent bullet on hit. 10%/20%/35% Chance

Legs.name: Bandit Trousers
Legs.desc: Freeloader Chance to replace spent bullet on hit. 10%/20%/35% Chance

Head.name: Carapace Great Helm
Head.desc: Harden After avoiding damage for 15s, armor hardens 1x per piece granting damage reduction. Damage removes a stack. If all stacks are removed, gain 10% bonus Movement Speed per piece (30% Max) for 5s. Increases Total damage from all sources by 5% per piece. 7.5%/15%/25% Reduction

Chest.name: Carapace Shell
Chest.desc: Harden After avoiding damage for 15s, armor hardens 1x per piece granting damage reduction. Damage removes a stack. If all stacks are removed, gain 10% bonus Movement Speed per piece (30% Max) for 5s. Increases Total damage from all sources by 5% per piece. 7.5%/15%/25% Reduction

Legs.name: Carapace Greaves
Legs.desc: Harden After avoiding damage for 15s, armor hardens 1x per piece granting damage reduction. Damage removes a stack. If all stacks are removed, gain 10% bonus Movement Speed per piece (30% Max) for 5s. Increases Total damage from all sources by 5% per piece. 7.5%/15%/25% Reduction

Head.name: Cultist Hat
Head.desc: Blood Pact Hits generate additional mod power. 12.5%/25%/40% Mod Power on Crits

Chest.name: Cultist Duster
Chest.desc: Blood Pact Hits generate additional mod power. 12.5%/25%/40% Mod Power on Crits

Legs.name: Cultist Britches
Legs.desc: Blood Pact Hits generate additional mod power. 12.5%/25%/40% Mod Power on Crits

Head.name: Drifter's Mask
Head.desc: Wanderer Stamina usage is reduced. 10%/20%/35% Stamina Usage

Chest.name: Drifter's Overcoat
Chest.desc: Wanderer Stamina usage is reduced. 10%/20%/35% Stamina Usage

Legs.name: Drifter's Trousers
Legs.desc: Wanderer Stamina usage is reduced. 10%/20%/35% Stamina Usage

Head.name: Elder Headdress
Head.desc: Believer Dragon Hearts will heal teammates within 15 meters. 25%50%/100% Heal Amount

Chest.name: Elder Raiment
Chest.desc: Believer Dragon Hearts will heal teammates within 15 meters. 25%50%/100% Heal Amount

Legs.name: Elder Leggings
Legs.desc: Believer Dragon Hearts will heal teammates within 15 meters. 25%50%/100% Heal Amount

Head.name: Hunter Shroud
Head.desc: Sharpshooter Increases total Ranged and Weakspot damage. Reduces Spread of firearms by 20%. 5%/10%/20% Ranged/Weakspot Damage

Chest.name: Hunter Trenchcoat
Chest.desc: Sharpshooter Increases total Ranged and Weakspot damage. Reduces Spread of firearms by 20%. 5%/10%/20% Ranged/Weakspot Damage

Legs.name: Hunter Pants
Legs.desc: Sharpshooter Increases total Ranged and Weakspot damage. Reduces Spread of firearms by 20%. 5%/10%/20% Ranged/Weakspot Damage

Head.name: Labyrinth Helm
Head.desc: Power Surge Increase Total Weapon Mod damage. Refunds 10% of Mod Power on use. 15%/30%/50% Damage

Chest.name: Labyrinth Armor
Chest.desc: Power Surge Increase Total Weapon Mod damage. Refunds 10% of Mod Power on use. 15%/30%/50% Damage

Legs.name: Labyrinth Greaves
Legs.desc: Power Surge Increase Total Weapon Mod damage. Refunds 10% of Mod Power on use. 15%/30%/50% Damage

Head.name: Leto's Helmet
Head.desc: Juggernaut 3-Piece: Reduces base incoming damage by 10%. Gain an additional 10% per 10% Max Health missing. Max 5 stacks. -25% Stamina Cost/-1 Stagger Reduction/+10% Damage Reduction per Stack

Chest.name: Leto's Armor
Chest.desc: Juggernaut 3-Piece: Reduces base incoming damage by 10%. Gain an additional 10% per 10% Max Health missing. Max 5 stacks. -25% Stamina Cost/-1 Stagger Reduction/+10% Damage Reduction per Stack

Legs.name: Leto's Leggings
Legs.desc: Juggernaut 3-Piece: Reduces base incoming damage by 10%. Gain an additional 10% per 10% Max Health missing. Max 5 stacks. -25% Stamina Cost/-1 Stagger Reduction/+10% Damage Reduction per Stack

Head.name: Osseous Helm
Head.desc: Bloodlust Subsequent Ranged or Melee hits against the same enemy increases wearer's Total damage dealt to that enemy. Effect degrades over time. Melee Speed and Fire Rate is increased by 5% 10%/20%/35% Maximum Damage

Chest.name: Osseous Husk
Chest.desc: Bloodlust Subsequent Ranged or Melee hits against the same enemy increases wearer's Total damage dealt to that enemy. Effect degrades over time. Melee Speed and Fire Rate is increased by 5% 10%/20%/35% Maximum Damage

Legs.name: Osseous Kilt
Legs.desc: Bloodlust Subsequent Ranged or Melee hits against the same enemy increases wearer's Total damage dealt to that enemy. Effect degrades over time. Melee Speed and Fire Rate is increased by 5% 10%/20%/35% Maximum Damage

Head.name: Radiant Visage
Head.desc: Momentum Critical hits increase Crit Chance and Crit damage for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Recoil is reduced by 15%. 0.75%/1.5%/3% Crit Chance and Damage

Chest.name: Radiant Protector
Chest.desc: Momentum Critical hits increase Crit Chance and Crit damage for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Recoil is reduced by 15%. 0.75%/1.5%/3% Crit Chance and Damage

Legs.name: Radiant Greaves
Legs.desc: Momentum Critical hits increase Crit Chance and Crit damage for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Recoil is reduced by 15%. 0.75%/1.5%/3% Crit Chance and Damage

Head.name: Scavenger Helmet
Head.desc: Salvager Ammo, Iron, Scrap pickups increase Total Ranged and Melee damage dealt, and reduce incoming damage. Stacks 10x. Lasts 30s. At or below 50% Health, pickups grant 2 stacks. Taking direct damage removes 1 stack. Pull Scrap and Iron materials towards the wearer. 0.5%/1%/2% Damage per Stack

Chest.name: Scavenger Armor
Chest.desc: Salvager Ammo, Iron, Scrap pickups increase Total Ranged and Melee damage dealt, and reduce incoming damage. Stacks 10x. Lasts 30s. At or below 50% Health, pickups grant 2 stacks. Taking direct damage removes 1 stack. Pull Scrap and Iron materials towards the wearer. 0.5%/1%/2% Damage per Stack

Legs.name: Scavenger Boots
Legs.desc: Salvager Ammo, Iron, Scrap pickups increase Total Ranged and Melee damage dealt, and reduce incoming damage. Stacks 10x. Lasts 30s. At or below 50% Health, pickups grant 2 stacks. Taking direct damage removes 1 stack. Pull Scrap and Iron materials towards the wearer. 0.5%/1%/2% Damage per Stack

Head.name: Scrapper Helmet
Head.desc: Challenger Increases Total Damage from all sources dealt by wearer to enemies within 5 meters. Receive 15% less damage from enemies within this range. 7.5%/15%/30% Damage

Chest.name: Scrapper Bodyplate
Chest.desc: Challenger Increases Total Damage from all sources dealt by wearer to enemies within 5 meters. Receive 15% less damage from enemies within this range. 7.5%/15%/30% Damage

Legs.name: Scrapper Workboots
Legs.desc: Challenger Increases Total Damage from all sources dealt by wearer to enemies within 5 meters. Receive 15% less damage from enemies within this range. 7.5%/15%/30% Damage

Head.name: Slayer Mask
Head.desc: Assassin Reloading increases the Total damage dealt to the next enemy hit with that weapon. Lasts 10 seconds. Reload speed is increased by 10% 7.5%/15%/30% Damage

Chest.name: Slayer Mantle
Chest.desc: Assassin Reloading increases the Total damage dealt to the next enemy hit with that weapon. Lasts 10 seconds. Reload speed is increased by 10% 7.5%/15%/30% Damage

Legs.name: Slayer Boots
Legs.desc: Assassin Reloading increases the Total damage dealt to the next enemy hit with that weapon. Lasts 10 seconds. Reload speed is increased by 10% 7.5%/15%/30% Damage

Head.name: Twisted Hood
Head.desc: Regrowth At full health, gain a Regrowth stack every 3 seconds which increases Total outgoing Melee and Weapon Mod damage. Stacks 10x. Taking damage removes 1 stack. Regenerates 0.334 Health per second. 0.75%/1.5%/3% Damage Boost per Stack

Chest.name: Twisted Cage
Chest.desc: Regrowth At full health, gain a Regrowth stack every 3 seconds which increases Total outgoing Melee and Weapon Mod damage. Stacks 10x. Taking damage removes 1 stack. Regenerates 0.334 Health per second. 0.75%/1.5%/3% Damage Boost per Stack

Legs.name: Twisted Tassets
Legs.desc: Regrowth At full health, gain a Regrowth stack every 3 seconds which increases Total outgoing Melee and Weapon Mod damage. Stacks 10x. Taking damage removes 1 stack. Regenerates 0.334 Health per second. 0.75%/1.5%/3% Damage Boost per Stack

Head.name: Void Skull
Head.desc: Power Transfer After 5 seconds, gain a boost that increases Total damage from all sources. Taking damage transfers the boost from Damage to Damage Reduction for 5 seconds. Standing Aim Movement Speed is increased by 25%. 7.5%/15%/25% Damage Boost

Chest.name: Void Carapace
Chest.desc: Power Transfer After 5 seconds, gain a boost that increases Total damage from all sources. Taking damage transfers the boost from Damage to Damage Reduction for 5 seconds. Standing Aim Movement Speed is increased by 25%. 7.5%/15%/25% Damage Boost

Legs.name: Void Greaves
Legs.desc: Power Transfer After 5 seconds, gain a boost that increases Total damage from all sources. Taking damage transfers the boost from Damage to Damage Reduction for 5 seconds. Standing Aim Movement Speed is increased by 25%. 7.5%/15%/25% Damage Boost

Head.name: Warlord Skull
Head.desc: Deathwish Dragon Hearts are no longer consumed for healing. They instead increase Ranged and Melee damage, grant lifesteal, and drain 200% health over 30s. Kills heal 5% over 3s. 10%/25%/35% Damage 1%/2%/3.5% Lifesteal

Chest.name: Warlord Armor
Chest.desc: Deathwish Dragon Hearts are no longer consumed for healing. They instead increase Ranged and Melee damage, grant lifesteal, and drain 200% health over 30s. Kills heal 5% over 3s. 10%/25%/35% Damage 1%/2%/3.5% Lifesteal

Legs.name: Warlord Boots
Legs.desc: Deathwish Dragon Hearts are no longer consumed for healing. They instead increase Ranged and Melee damage, grant lifesteal, and drain 200% health over 30s. Kills heal 5% over 3s. 10%/25%/35% Damage 1%/2%/3.5% Lifesteal

Head.name: Twisted Mask
Head.desc: Regrowth At full health, gain a Regrowth stack every 3 seconds which increases Total outgoing Melee and Weapon Mod damage. Stacks 10x. Taking damage removes 1 stack. Regenerates 0.334 Health per second. 0.75%/1.5%/3% Damage Boost per Stack

Head.name: Bomber Hat
Head.desc: Team Player Increases the Range of the Teamwork trait. 10m/20m/30m Teamwork Range

HandMod.name: Flame Thrower
HandMod.desc: Spews flames that will ignite targets with the BURNING effect dealing 100 FIRE damage over 10 seconds.

HandMod.name: Hive Shot
HandMod.desc: Fires a projectile that deals 20 CORROSIVE damage within 2.5 meters releasing an insect cloud that lasts for 12 seconds. Spreads to nearby enemies.

HandMod.name: Radioactive Volley
HandMod.desc: Fires a volley of 6 Radioactive projectiles that bounce off of the environment and deal 35 RADIATION damage each.

HandMod.name: Tentacle Shot
HandMod.desc: Launches a projectile which summon a TENTACLE. Tentacles deals 75 SHOCK damage, steals 1.25% of the hero's Max Health per hit, and apply the OVERLOADED effect. Lasts 30 seconds. (Max 2).

HandMod.name: Vampiric
HandMod.desc: Fires 4 beetles that will fly towards enemies within 10 meters, land on them, and steal 50 health over 5 seconds. Once full, they will fly back and heal the hero.

LongMod.name: Banish
LongMod.desc: Fires a projectile that banishes enemies into another dimension for 4 seconds. When they return, they'll take 1.25x the damage from the Repulsor's primary fire for 8 seconds. Powerful enemies won't be banished, but will take increased damage from the Repulsor.

LongMod.name: Fusion Cannon
LongMod.desc: Fires a large powerful beam that penetrates through enemies dealing 180 for a single charge. Multiple charges increase damage dealt, recoil, and beam thickness per charge. 5 stacks. Passive: Charges increase primary fire rate. Mod power slowly drains after 2 seconds of not dealing damage.

LongMod.name: Gravity Core
LongMod.desc: Fires a projectile which deals 50 damage and opens a gravity well for 5 seconds. Once unstable it explode dealing up to 500 damage within 5 meters. Adds 300 damage per enemy and divides total damage among all enemies.

LongMod.name: Incinerator
LongMod.desc: Spews 11 fireballs that deal 15 FIRE damage within 2 meters each and ignites enemies with BURNING effect dealing 100 FIRE damage over 10 seconds.

LongMod.name: Skewer
LongMod.desc: Fires a large spike that deals 125 damage, 300% additional stagger damage, and applies BLEEDING effect dealing 600 damage over 20 seconds.

LongMod.name: Spore Shot
LongMod.desc: Fires an explosive round that deals 25 ROT damage within 3 meters and will leave a deadly gas cloud that slows enemies and lasts for 7 seconds.

LongMod.name: Static Field Shot
LongMod.desc: Fires a projectile that deals 65 SHOCK damage and applies the OVERLOADED effect. Overloaded enemies will trigger an explosion when they get within 4 meters from each other dealing up to 325 SHOCK damage within a 5 meter.

LongMod.name: Undying
LongMod.desc: If charged upon death, the wielder will be revived with 50% Health. They will also take 10% less damage and be immune to STATUS effects for 5 seconds. 5 minutes cooldown.

RegularMods.name: Beckon
RegularMods.desc: Summons a WASTELAND SKULL which shoots projectiles that deal 40 damage per hit. Lasts 60 seconds. (Max 2)

RegularMods.name: Blink Token
RegularMods.desc: Teleports the caster forward up to 13 meters and creates an electrical blast that deals 210 SHOCK damage within 3 meters.

RegularMods.name: Blizzard
RegularMods.desc: Cast a storm cloud that rains icicles as it travels forward up to 30 meters. Icicles deal 30 FROST damage each and apply FROSTBITE to enemies within 2 meters.

RegularMods.name: Breath of the Desert
RegularMods.desc: Discharge 7 radioactive projectiles that will seek towards enemies within 20 meters and deal 30 RADIATION damage each.

RegularMods.name: Cold Spear
RegularMods.desc: Throws an ice spear that deals 50 FROST damage within 3.5 meters and applies 3 stacks of FROSTBITE. Direct hits apply the FROZEN effect.

RegularMods.name: Corrosive Aura
RegularMods.desc: Projects a 5 meter aura that moves with the caster and applies CORRODED stacks over time. Each stack reduces enemy defense by 5%. Max 5 stacks. Lasts 30 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Explosive Shot
RegularMods.desc: Fires an explosive round that deals up to 240 damage to enemies within 4 meters.

RegularMods.name: Fan of Knives
RegularMods.desc: Throw a fan of 7 knives that deal 20 damage each and apply the BLEEDING effect dealing 200 damage over 20 seconds. Max 2 Charges.

RegularMods.name: Flicker Cloak
RegularMods.desc: Surrounds the caster with a magical shield absorbing 50% of their Max Health in damage from incoming attacks and prevents getting staggered. Lasts 15 seconds. 10 seconds cooldown.

RegularMods.name: Frozen Mist
RegularMods.desc: Fires a projectile that deals 10 FROST damage, releases a freezing cloud that lasts 10 seconds, and applies FROSTBITE to enemies within 3 meters. Applies 3 FROSTBITE stacks on a direct hit. Players walking through the cloud will take damage and FROSTBITE buildup.

RegularMods.name: Hot Shot
RegularMods.desc: Ammunition is imbues with flame dealing FIRE damage which is increased by 15%. Shots also have a 100% chance to apply the BURNING effect, dealing 100 FIRE damage over 10 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Howler's Immunity
RegularMods.desc: Projects a 20 meter aura that moves with the caster and reduces incoming damage to all allies standing in the aura by 15%. Lasts 30 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Hunter's Mark
RegularMods.desc: Marks all enemies within 35 meters for the caster and their allies. Crit Chance against marked enemies is increased by 10%. Lasts 30 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Iron Sentinel
RegularMods.desc: Summons a full automatic TURRET that shoots at 5 rounds per second and deals 5 damage per hit. Lasts 30 seconds. (Max 2)

RegularMods.name: Mantle of Thorns
RegularMods.desc: Reduces Melee damage taken from enemies by 20%, reflects 120% of Melee damage taken, and reduces stagger on hit. Lasts 60 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Mender's Aura
RegularMods.desc: Creates a 2.3 meter healing pool that regenerates 10 Health per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Rattle Weed
RegularMods.desc: Shoots a projectile that summons a RATTLE WEED upon impact with 200 Health and draws aggro on enemies within 10 meters. Lasts 10 seconds. Does not affect powerful enemies. (Max 1)

RegularMods.name: Rift Walker
RegularMods.desc: Enter a rift for 2.8 seconds leaving a summoned CLONE behind which draws aggro within 12.5 meters. The caster is invulnerable and their Movement Speed is increased by 30%. Upon exiting, the clone explodes dealing 250 damage within 5.5 meters. Does not affect powerful enemies. 15 second cooldown. (Max 1).

RegularMods.name: Seed Caller
RegularMods.desc: Summons a ROOT HOLLOW that deals 50 damage per hit. Lasts 30 seconds. (Max 2)

RegularMods.name: Seeker
RegularMods.desc: Summons a BEETLE that will rush towards enemies and explode dealing 160 CORROSIVE damage within 4 meters. Lasts 30 seconds. (Max 3)

RegularMods.name: Song of Swords
RegularMods.desc: Projects a 25 meter aura that moves with the caster. All allies standing in that aura will have all of their damage dealt increased by 10%. Lasts for 30 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Storm Caller
RegularMods.desc: Conjures an electrical storm centered around the caster which discharges lightning strikes that deal 40 SHOCK damage to nearby enemies within 35 meters and reduces incoming damage by 50%. Lasts 12 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Swarm
RegularMods.desc: Unleash insects that will seek after enemies within 20 meters and repeatedly attack dealing 5 CORROSIVE damage per hit. Lasts 15 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Unstable Quills
RegularMods.desc: Unleash a rapid burst of 12 quills. Press F again to detonate dealing 15 CORROSIVE damage each within 2.5 meters. Overcharge quills by shooting an enemy with quills attached until they glow, then detonate increasing the damage to 30 CORROSIVE damage each.

RegularMods.name: Veil of the Black Tear
RegularMods.desc: Generates a 5 meter impenetrable energy field. Heroes standing inside the energy field can shoot outward. Lasts 10 seconds.

RegularMods.name: Very Good Boy
RegularMods.desc: Summons a VERY GOOD BOY that deals 80 damage per bite. Pet the dog to increase his damage dealt by 5% for 60 seconds. Lasts 60 seconds. (Max 1)

RegularMods.name: Wildfire Shot
RegularMods.desc: Shoots an arcing fireball that deals 25 FIRE damage and ignites enemies with the BURNING effect within 2 meters, dealing 300 FIRE damage over 10 seconds.

Amulets.name: Abrasive Amulet
Amulets.desc: Doubles application of the CORRODED effect. Melee Charge Attacks apply the CORRODED effect.

Amulets.name: Amulet of Epicaricacy
Amulets.desc: Increases Mod Power generation by 15%. When attacking an enemy with an active STATUS effect, Mod power generation is increased by an additional 30%.

Amulets.name: Black Rose
Amulets.desc: The wearer's chest armor set bonus is increased by 1 piece. It will not exceed the 3 piece armor set bonus.

Amulets.name: Blessed Necklace
Amulets.desc: Receiving a benefit from a Dragon Heart reduces incoming damage by 30% for 10 seconds.

Amulets.name: Brutal Mark
Amulets.desc: After being equipped for 60 seconds, increases all damage by 25% to enemies that have less than 50% Health.

Amulets.name: Butcher's Fetish
Amulets.desc: Gain 15% Crit Chance and 25% Crit Damage for 10 seconds after striking an enemy with a Charge Melee Attack.

Amulets.name: Charcoal Necklace
Amulets.desc: Increase FIRE damage from all sources by 15% and BURNING damage by 50%.

Amulets.name: Cleansing Jewel
Amulets.desc: Dragon Heart removes all STATUS effects from all allies. STATUS effect buildup on wearer is reduced by 50%.

Amulets.name: Daredevil's Charm
Amulets.desc: Increases Total damage dealt by 30% for each piece of unequipped armor. Damage received is increased by 15%.

Amulets.name: Driftstone
Amulets.desc: Doubles FROSTBITE application.

Amulets.name: Galenic Charm
Amulets.desc: Increases Weapon Mod damage by 25%.

Amulets.name: Gunslinger's Charm
Amulets.desc: Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 20%.

Amulets.name: Hangman's Memento
Amulets.desc: Increase Weakspot damage by an additional 50% for 10 seconds after killing an enemy.

Amulets.name: Heart of Darkness
Amulets.desc: Increases Ranged and Melee damage dealt by 20%. Increases damage received by 50% for 30 seconds after using a Dragon Heart.

Amulets.name: Leto's Amulet
Amulets.desc: Reduces Armor Encumbrance by 40% and Stamina cost by 15%.

Amulets.name: Mender's Charm
Amulets.desc: Dragon Hearts heal all allies with 100% base effectiveness. Increases all Healing Effectiveness by 50%.

Amulets.name: Nightmare Spiral
Amulets.desc: Ranged hits steal 3% of base damage dealt as Health. Consumable Healing Effectiveness is reduced by 95%.

Amulets.name: Onyx Pendulum
Amulets.desc: Dealing firearm damage adds stacks which increase the damage of the stowed firearm by 2.5% for 15 seconds. Stacks 10 times.

Amulets.name: Pocket Watch
Amulets.desc: Increases Stamina Regen by 20 per second and reduces Stamina Cost by 20%.

Amulets.name: Polished Whetstone
Amulets.desc: When attacking a BLEEDING enemy, Crit Chance is increased by 15% and Crit Damage increased by 35%.

Amulets.name: Radioactive Ember
Amulets.desc: Increases RADIATION damage by 15% and converts basic melee weapons from physical to elemental dealing RADIATION damage.

Amulets.name: Razorwire Necklace
Amulets.desc: Increase BLEEDING damage by 50% and Ranged and Melee damage dealt to enemies with BLEEDING by 15%.

Amulets.name: Rock of Anguish
Amulets.desc: Gain 10% Movement Speed and 15% Reload Speed for every 25% of Max Health missing.

Amulets.name: Rusted Amulet
Amulets.desc: Reduces Stamina Cost by 80% but increases Armor Encumbrance by 25.

Amulets.name: Scavenger's Bauble
Amulets.desc: Increases the amount of Scrap picked up by 50%.

Amulets.name: Shattered Vertebrae
Amulets.desc: Increase Ranged damage by 10%. When dealing Non-Critical damage with a firearm, Crit Chance is increased by 2% and Crit damage is increased by 5%. When a Critical Hit occurs, Crit Chance and Crit Chance damage are reset.

Amulets.name: Soul Anchor
Amulets.desc: Increases the duration of summons creatures by 100% and increases wearer's Ranged and Melee damage by 6.25% (max 25%) per summoned minion.

Amulets.name: Stalker's Brand
Amulets.desc: Firearm sound is reduced by 25%. When crouched, increases Movement Speed by 20% and reduces enemy Awareness Range by 15%.

Amulets.name: Storm Amulet
Amulets.desc: Increases SHOCK damage by 15%. Weapon Mods that inflict SHOCK damage deal an additional 10%.

Amulets.name: Talisman of Animosity
Amulets.desc: Increases Weakspot damage by 30%. Weakspot kills increase all damage by 10% for 10 seconds.

Amulets.name: Talisman of Perseverance
Amulets.desc: Increases earned Experience by 1% when slaying an enemy and will last until the wearer dies, unequips the amulet, or rests at a checkpoint. Stacking up to 50 times.

Amulets.name: Terror Margin
Amulets.desc: Melee hits steal 1.5% of the base damage dealt as Health. For every 25% missing Health, gain an additional 1.5% lifesteal. With full health, gain 20% Melee damage.

Amulets.name: Twisted Idol
Amulets.desc: Increases Armor Effectiveness by 30% and reduces Encumbrance by 15.

Amulets.name: Vengeance Idol
Amulets.desc: All damage dealt is increased by 30% when the wearer's Health is below 50%. Includes Summons.

Amulets.name: Vulcan's Detonator
Amulets.desc: Increases Explosion Damage by 25%. Explosions apply BURNING status effect.

Amulets.name: White Rose
Amulets.desc: Increases all damage dealt by 25% for each unequipped firearm.

Rings.name: Aggressor's Bane
Rings.desc: Reduces incoming damage by 15%, but also increases enemy aggression towards the wearer, and increases enemy Awareness Range by 200%.

Rings.name: Akari War Band
Rings.desc: Perfect Dodging enemy attacks increases Crit Change by 15% and Crit damage by 15% for 20 seconds.

Rings.name: Alchemist's Jewel
Rings.desc: Increases Armor Effectiveness by 50%, but also increases Armor Encumberance by 25.

Rings.name: Amber Moonstone
Rings.desc: When wearer's Health drops below 25%, all STATUS effects will be removed, and incoming dmg reduced by 15% for 20s.

Rings.name: Backbreaker Ring
Rings.desc: Increase Melee Backstab damage by 30%.

Rings.name: Band of Accord
Rings.desc: Ammo acquired on pickup is increased by 25% per player in the lobby and is then divided up between them.

Rings.name: Band of Castor
Rings.desc: Increased Melee Speed by 10%, but reduces Fire rate by 15%. While wearing BAND OF CASTOR, Melee Damage is increased by 10%, Evade Speed is increased by 15%, and Encumbrance is reduced by 25.

Rings.name: Band of Discord
Rings.desc: Reduces Consumable Use Speed by 15%. Dragon Hearts heal the wearer with 125 Health over 30 seconds.

Rings.name: Band of Pollux
Rings.desc: Increased Melee Damage by 15%, but reduces Ranged Damage by 15%. While wearing BAND OF CASTOR, Melee Damage is increased by 10%, Evade Speed is increased by 15%, and Encumbrance is reduced by 25.

Rings.name: Band of Strength
Rings.desc: Melee Charge Attacks Increase Melee damage by 5% for 10 seconds. Stacks 4 times.

Rings.name: Black Cat Band
Rings.desc: When taking fatal damage, wearer's Health will drop to 1 instead of dying. 1 minute cooldown.

Rings.name: Blood Font
Rings.desc: Increases Health regeneration by 0.384 per second and increases all Healing Effectiveness by 15%.

Rings.name: Bloodletter's Insignia
Rings.desc: BLEEDING effects applied by the wearer steal 2% dmg dealt and return it to the wearer as Health.

Rings.name: Braided Thorns
Rings.desc: Increases Crit Chance by 10%. Gain an additional 10% for 10 seconds after slaying an enemy.

Rings.name: Bright Steel Ring
Rings.desc: Gives wearer the fastest evade roll regardless of their Armor Encumbrance.

Rings.name: Burden of the Devoted
Rings.desc: All damage dealt by wearer is reduced by 15%. 50% of self healing applies to allies.

Rings.name: Burden of the Follower
Rings.desc: Reduces Fire Rate by 25%. Increases Mod Power generation by 100%.

Rings.name: Burden of the Gambler
Rings.desc: Disables Weakspot damage bonus. Increases Crit Chance by 15% and Crit Damage by 25%.

Rings.name: Burden of the Reckless
Rings.desc: Disables healing from Dragon Hearts. Perfect dodging enemy attacks will regenerate 5% of the wearer´s Max Health per second over 5 seconds.

Rings.name: Burden of the Warlord
Rings.desc: Reduces effective range of all firearms by 50% and increases all dmg dealt by 15%.

Rings.name: Celerity Stone
Rings.desc: Increases Consumable Use Speed by 40% and increases Reload Speed by 20% and Weapon Swap Speed by 25% for 15s after using a Consumable.

Rings.name: Compulsion Loop
Rings.desc: Increases Movement Speed by 20%, Fire Rate by 15%, and Melee Speed by 10% for 7 seconds after slaying an enemy.

Rings.name: Deceiver's Band
Rings.desc: Increases Evade Speed by 25% and Movement Speed by 15% for 10 seconds after performing a slide.

Rings.name: Devouring Loop
Rings.desc: Critical Hits have a 6% chance to deal 4x damage.

Rings.name: Empowering Loop
Rings.desc: Increases Ranged damage by 25%, but decreases Fire rate by 10%.

Rings.name: Evoker's Seal
Rings.desc: Refunds 10% Mod Power on use.

Rings.name: Ezlan's Band
Rings.desc: Increases Health by 25 and Health regeneration by 0.238 per second.

Rings.name: Five Fingered Ring
Rings.desc: Increases Unarmed Melee damage by 50%, Crit damage by 50%, and Crit Chance by 25%.

Rings.name: Gift of the Iskal
Rings.desc: Mod Power is generated slowly over time (5/s), but reduces the wearer´s Healing Effectiveness by 15%

Rings.name: Gravity Stone
Rings.desc: Increases all damage by 20% when there are at least 2 enemies within 10 meters of the wearer.

Rings.name: Grim Coil
Rings.desc: Reloading a weapon after dealing 40% of the base damage from a single magazine increases its damage by 7% for 15 seconds. Stacks 3 times

Rings.name: Guardian's Ring
Rings.desc: Reduce incoming Melee damage by 20%.

Rings.name: Gunslinger's Ring
Rings.desc: Increases Firearm Swap Speed by 50% and Fire Rate by 10%

Rings.name: Heart of the Wolf
Rings.desc: Increases Max Stamina by 25 and Movement speed by 10%.

Rings.name: Heartseeker
Rings.desc: Provides a 100% Crit Chance against non-aggressive enemies and increases Crit Damage by 20%.

Rings.name: Hero's Ring
Rings.desc: Increases Movement Speed by 25% while sprinting towards a wounded teammate. Revive Speed is increased by 100% and the wearer cannot by staggered while reviving

Rings.name: Hunter's Band
Rings.desc: Increases Ranged damage by 10% and Weakspot damage by 20%.

Rings.name: Hunter's Halo
Rings.desc: Increase the effective Range of all firearms by 6m.

Rings.name: Iskal Hunter Band
Rings.desc: Reduces Spread by 40%.

Rings.name: Jewel of the Black Sun
Rings.desc: Increases Ranged damage by 7% for 20 seconds after a Ranged kill. Stacks 3 times.

Rings.name: Juggernaut Band
Rings.desc: After sprinting for 2s, incoming dmg reduced by 10%. Movement Speed increased by 10%, stagger level is reduced by 1, and the wearer will perform the heaviest evade.

Rings.name: Keeper's Ring
Rings.desc: Increases resistance to all ELEMENTAL damage by 20.

Rings.name: Leech Ember
Rings.desc: Melee hits steal 2.5% of the base damage dealt as Health.

Rings.name: Loop of Prosperity
Rings.desc: Metal materials acquired on pickup are doubled.

Rings.name: Mother's Ring
Rings.desc: Reduces incoming Ranged Damage by 20%.

Rings.name: Pearl of Luminescence
Rings.desc: Wearer has a 70% chance to double the amount of Lumenite Crystal acquired on pickup when killing Elite enemies.

Rings.name: Pillar of Stone
Rings.desc: Reduces Recoil by 30% and Weapon Sway by 60%. Standing Aim Movement Speed is increased by 50%.

Rings.name: Prismatic Diamond Ring
Rings.desc: Increases all ELEMENTAL dmg by 10%.

Rings.name: Provisioner Ring
Rings.desc: Firearms reload over time while stowed.

Rings.name: Razorstone
Rings.desc: Melee Charge Attacks apply the BLEEDING effect dealing 600 damage over 20 seconds.

Rings.name: Restriction Cord
Rings.desc: Restricts the wearer from Healing above 50% of their Max Health and reduces incoming damage by 15%.

Rings.name: Ring of Elusion
Rings.desc: Perfect Dodging enemy attacks refunds 50 Stamina and reduces Stamina Cost by 100% for 10 seconds.

Rings.name: Ring of Evasion
Rings.desc: Moderately increases Evade Window and increases Evade Speed by 10%.

Rings.name: Ring of Flawless Beauty
Rings.desc: Ranged Weakspot dmg increased by 40%. Ranged dmg is reduced 20% when failing to shoot a weakspot.

Rings.name: Ring of Honor
Rings.desc: Increases Health by 10, Stamina by 10, and reduces Armor Encumbrance by 10.

Rings.name: Ring of Shadows
Rings.desc: Reduces enemy Awareness Range by 25%. Increases Ranged damage against non-aggressive enemies by 15%.

Rings.name: Ring of Supremacy
Rings.desc: Increases all damage dealt by 20% after the wearer's health has been full for at least 10 seconds

Rings.name: Ring of Synergy
Rings.desc: Increases Teamwork effect by 10% and Revive Speed by 11% per ally also wearing this ring.

Rings.name: Ring of the Admiral
Rings.desc: Damage received is increased by 300%. All damage dealt is increased by 15%. Includes Summons.

Rings.name: Ring of the Mantis
Rings.desc: Increase Fire Rate by 15% and Crit damage by 20% when the wearer stops moving for at least 1.0 seconds

Rings.name: Ring of the Punisher
Rings.desc: Increases all damage dealt by 5% towards enemies for every STATUS effect applied to them.

Rings.name: Ring of the Unclean
Rings.desc: Unarmed Melee attacks deal 2x damage. Heavy Flops deal 2.5x damage.

Rings.name: Root Circlet
Rings.desc: Increases Melee Speed by 15%.

Rings.name: Sagestone
Rings.desc: Increases earned Experience by 30%. (10% in Survival)

Rings.name: Scavenger's Ring
Rings.desc: Collecting Scrap, Iron, and Ammo pickups regenerates 3% of Max Health

Rings.name: Serpent's Fang
Rings.desc: Increases Charged Melee Damage by 20%.

Rings.name: Soul Ember
Rings.desc: Summon health is reduced by 60%. On death they´ll explode dealing 150 plus weapon level damage within 4 meters. Summons that explode normally will deal 25% bonus damage.

Rings.name: Soul Link
Rings.desc: Summons will steal 5% of the damage dealt and return it to the wearer as health.

Rings.name: Spirit Stone
Rings.desc: Increases Mod Power generation by 25% and Weapon Mod damage by 10%.

Rings.name: Stockpile Circlet
Rings.desc: Increases Max Ammo reserves for all firearms by 50%.

Rings.name: Stone of Balance
Rings.desc: Increases Ranged and Melee damage by 15%.

Rings.name: Swashbuckler's Signet
Rings.desc: Every 20 seconds gain a buff, stacks up to 3. Melee Charge Attacks consume 1 stack and replenish 15% of the wearer's ammo capacity for both firearms.

Rings.name: Vanguard Ring
Rings.desc: Melee Charge attacks reduce incoming and outgoing damage by 4% and increase enemy aggression towards wearer for 15 seconds. Stacks 5 times.

Rings.name: Volatile Gem
Rings.desc: Dragon Hearts explode dealing 200 dmg plus 10% per gear score and inflict an additional 100% Stagger Damage within 5m.
